+971509233586 | saminshahid97@gmail.com  | www.linkedin.com/in/samin- shahid- assoc -cipd | Dubai,  UAE  
 
Profile  
I am a certified L earning  & Development  specialist, a certified HR Business Partner, a certified strategy leader, and a balanced 
scorecard expert with a CIPD Level 7. I am passionate about  strategy planning, L&D, employee engagement, and  performance  
management, and I have a keen i nterest in digital transformation. I see HR as a value -creating strategic section, rather than a cost -
saving administrative  section.  I have more than 3 years of experience in managing end -to-end HR processes, working with 300+ 
employees.  
I implemented initiatives that helped to increase employee engagement by 9 %, employee satisfaction by 11%, employee retention 
by 6%, employee learning hours by 60%, and reduce onboarding lead time by 22%, and paper & printing expenses by 13%.   
 
Functional HR Competencies  
 
 
 
 
Work  Experience  
Emirates District  Cooling (EMICOOL ) LLC.  | Promoted to HR Specialist  
March  2022 – Present  
 
• Strategy Planning  & Implementation  
- Working with the CEO to  create a clear, concise & executable corporate  strategy  roadmap  & balanced  scorecard  for next 3 years , presented 
it to the board and communicated it to all employees  
- Designed & revised  key strategic goals, core values,  mission,  and vision for the company 
- Established  departmental  objectives,  KPIs  & targets  and ensured they aligned with the overall  business  strategy  
- Collaborated with business unit heads to understand  financials,  customer  value  proposition,  internal  processes  & organizational  capacity  to 
devise a strategy for each business unit.  
- Developed the Shared Services  scorecard and created dashboards to benchmark and report metrics  
 
• Learning  & Development  
- Organized  over 50 trainings  for 300+ employees  in 2.5 years and increased training participation by 13%  
- Created & implemented an internship program that increased the number of interns in the company by 15  
- Created & implemented an Emirati graduate trainee program  that helped the company achieve its Emiratization goals.  
- Introduced LinkedIn Learning to the company which increased the total hours of learning by 60%.  
- Created an empl oyee award pertaining to learning to promote a culture of learning  
- Conducting organiza tion-wide  training  needs  analysis  to understand each department’s  training  requirements and identify skills  gaps 
- Handling all admin  activities  related  to LinkedIn Learnin g, creat ing learning paths specific to each job role and monitoring employee 
learning to ensure that employees are achieving their professional development goals.  
- Collaborating  with each business unit  head to create training  plans, career  paths  and personal  development  plans for their teams and 
recommending training s based  on performance gaps 
- Liaising with vendors/trainers  to provide  in-house  or online  trainings & managing the training  budget  
- Conducting pre- and post-training  evaluation  surveys and feedback sessions  
- Assisted with skills assessments as part of the replacement process for core business functions  
- Organized 1 -year leadership coaching sessions for 25 high- potential employees to create a robust succession pipeline    
- Arranged coaching & mentoring  trainings for senior managers and unit heads which increased employee satisfaction by 42% as measured by 
upward feedback surveys.  
- Training HR interns  
 
• Employee  Engagement, Communications  & Surveys  
- Collaborating with marketing  team  to create Diversity  & Inclusion,  and mental  health  awareness  campaigns  
- Promoting work -life balance by a rranging team  building,  employee  wellbeing , and CSR activities  like yoga, planting trees, desert clean-
up, fitness festival, spartan race, volunteering activities, etc.   
- Conducting monthly office trivia to engage employees  
- Coordinating  with vendors  & event  managers  for venues, transport,  etc. 
- Organizing and hosting annual  gatherings,  virtual events, and webinars.  
 
SAMIN SHAHID,  Assoc.  CIPD,  HRBP  
Talent Acq

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
